titlepage.titleproper: Records of the Office of the Vice President for Administration, Stuart K. Cassell, 1945-1975
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections RG 6/1
titlepage.publisher: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Records of the Office of the Vice President for Administration, Stuart K. Cassell, 1945-1975
did.physloc: Please note: The Records of the Office of the Vice President for Administration, Stuart K. Cassell are located in off-site storage and require 2-3 days notice for retrieval. Contact Special Collections for more information.
did.abstract: This collection consists primarily of correspondence with Stuart K. Cassell, first Vice President for Administration (1966-1975). There is a large amount of material concerning budget and other financial matters, as well as construction, buildings and grounds maintenance, and other physical plant matters. The collection also contains Cassell's records as Business Manager, 1945-1966. Because the bulk of the material concerns Cassell’s position as Vice President for Administration, but the material is interfiled, the records have been kept together as one collection under RG 6/1.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Records of the Office of the Vice President for Administration, Stuart K. Cassell, must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Records of the Office of the Vice President for Administration, Stuart K. Cassell, RG 6/1, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Records of the Office of the Vice President for Administration, Stuart K. Cassell were donated to Special Collections on an unknown date.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement and description of the Records of the Office of the Vice President for Administration, Stuart K. Cassell commenced in September 2009 and was completed in November 2010. One addition box was completed in March 2011.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: A native of Rural Retreat, Virginia, Stuart Kent Cassell, Jr. (1910-1976) first came to Virginia Tech in the late 1920s as an undergraduate, receiving a bachelor's degree in animal science in 1932 and a master's in economics in 1933. He became an instructor of agricultural economics in 1933, and in 1939 he was appointed state executive officer for the Agricultural Adjustment Administration. Appointed finance and business manager in 1945, he was an administrator under four presidents. He was instrumental in the planning and long-term development of Virginia Tech to accommodate its steadily increasing enrollment. He was also a member of the board of directors of VPI Facilities, Inc. and the Virginia Tech Student Aid Association. He was named Vice president for Administration by President T. Marshall Hahn, Jr. in 1966. He died in October 1976 at the age of 66. The Stuart K. Cassell Coliseum was named in his honor and dedicated on September 17, 1977.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The records of the Vice President for Administration, Stuart K. Cassell span the years 1945 to 1975. The records consist primarily of Cassell's correspondence, first as business manager (1945-1966) and then as Vice President for Administration (1966-1975). The records concern budgets and other financial matters as well as construction, buildings and grounds maintenance, and other physical plant matters.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged chronologically by year. Within each year, materials are arranged by subject file.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Virginia Polytechnic Institute
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
